POST /accounts/{identifier}/devices/post.description: Create a new Device Posture Rule.

description.description: The description of the Device Posture Rule.
description.example: The rule for admin serial numbers

expiration.description: Sets the expiration time for a posture check result. If empty, the result remains valid until it is overwritten by new data from the WARP client.

input.description: The value to be checked against.

match.description: The conditions that the client must match to run the rule.

name.description: The name of the Device Posture Rule.

schedule.description: Polling frequency for the WARP client posture check. Default: `5m` (poll every five minutes). Minimum: `1m`.

type.description: The type of Device Posture Rule.
